sense.def:
To defer an event or action
pomeni poskrbeti, da se neki dogodek ali dejanje zgodi pozneje, kot je bilo načrtovano.

seg.quote: They offered to defer his appointment for a year.

sense.def:
To defer to someone
pomeni sprejeti mnenje drugega človeka ali zaradi spoštovanja zanj storiti tisto, kar želi.

seg.quote: ‘He's a medical man and we'd be fools not to defer to him in medical matters.’
